__e: I know I should have talked to him.
All right, men, I'm gonna go over there and warm her up a bit.
Maybe I could talk to your old lady, try and fix it up.
Yeah, or, like, maybe you could talk to him since you like him so much.
I'll look like a flip-flopper. Listen, my sister Amy's son is having a tough time at school, and since his dad is out of the picture, I thought maybe you could sit down and talk to him.
And, paradoxically, now it comes out ... that we have never been in this house why? It came to mind ... to speak of its existence.
You stand here today telling us about your big achievement, like you did it all on your own.
We know this is hard, but can you tell us about the phone call?
Isn't it the time you tell us the plan ?
I understand you want to talk to us about the body that we found last night.
But you were the one who told us about the good doctor in the first place.
Okay. Now that you have your brother and your special tea, you want to talk to us about your mother?
Took her a year to tell us about Ethan. She never even mentioned the fact that she slept with my brother.
Shouldn't we talk to him again, see if he's forgetting something?
Is it when you wanna know a person and talk to the person and just... just know everything about the person?
In the middle of all this shit, your daughter said she wanted to talk to us and we didn't even asked her why!
All right, look, my only point is... That the kids have issues, you need to talk to them, and I don't want anything !
